Module com.chazwinter.minesweeper
Package com.chazwinter.minesweeper.util

Class UIProperties

java.lang.Object
com.chazwinter.minesweeper.util.UIProperties
public class UIProperties extends Object
This class contains various UI constants that are used in the rest of the app. To change UI parameters, you should change them in this class.
